body:
Hello!!!!!!!}

Do u guys remember me?

I thing yes hahahaha, so hello guys im back here also for take a break of MC pvp minigames and i decided to come back and now i need ur helps u guys have to join this with ur facebook accounts and i can get points for win a razer pack

LINK: http://splur.gy/r/0KWGl/r/2MLMShQ7VRh

So ya i need ur help for this and i have only 5 points and i have 3 days for get a lot of points and for that i need ur help

If u guys can share this with ur friend i probbably can win!!! so ya wish me luck and SYGL (See You Guys Later)

I love us <3 peace.

title: I need ur help

replies.body:
So you just came back onto avicus so that we can get YOU a razer headset...?

By the way ALL those websites are scams, don't get your hopes up.
